segments.text: I feel disgusted by the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, not even noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so careless, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not even noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the cabinets, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how messy this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just gross to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR
